titles.title: Veteran Service Equity Act
Veteran Service Equity Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to include a full-time job with a veterans service organization as a public service job eligible for public service loan forgiveness.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Veteran Service Equity Act
This bill expands the definition of public service job for participation in the Public Service Loan Forgiveness program to include a full-time job with a veterans service organization.
